metadata.name: BE NICE
metadata.description:
This digital painting by Iabadiou Piko illustrates the workings of the mind of a free child roaming through day to day life. 

The PLAYGRND is both a space of freedom and death, where the child runs free amongst tombstones, monsters, phallic objects, crayons, and playthings of the past.

2000 x 2400 Pixels
32 Bit depth
